gov.va.vinci.leo

Class CommandLineClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.vinci.leo.CommandLineClient

  • public class CommandLineClient
extends Object
    An example UIMA AS Client that takes command line arguments for its configuration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandLineClient()
      Default constructor.
      CommandLineClient(File clientConfigFile, File readerConfig, File[] listenerConfigFiles)
      Initialize the client using groovy config files for the client, reader, and one or more listeners.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandLineClient

        public CommandLineClient()
        Default constructor.

      • CommandLineClient

        public CommandLineClient(File clientConfigFile,
                 File readerConfig,
                 File[] listenerConfigFiles)
        Initialize the client using groovy config files for the client, reader, and one or more listeners.
        Parameters:
        clientConfigFile - client groovy config file.
        readerConfig - reader groovy config file.
        listenerConfigFiles - array of groovy config files for one or more listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • getListeners

        public static List<org.apache.uima.aae.client.UimaAsBaseCallbackListener> getListeners(File... configs)
                                                                                throws MalformedURLException
        Parse the groovy config files, and return the listener objects that are defined in them.
        Parameters:
        configs - the groovy config files to slurp
        Returns:
        the list of listeners that are defined in the groovy configs.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the configuration file url that was set is invalid.

      • getReader

        public static BaseLeoCollectionReader getReader(File config)
                                         throws MalformedURLException
        Parse the groovy config file, and return the reader object. This must be a BaseLeoCollectionReader.
        Parameters:
        config - the groovy config file to slurp
        Returns:
        the reader defined in the groovy config.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the configuration file url that was set is invalid.

      • setClientProperties

        protected Client setClientProperties(Client leoClient)
                              throws MalformedURLException,
                                     InvocationTargetException,
                                     IllegalAccessException
        Set the client properties, such as brokerURL, from a pre-loaded groovy config file.
        Parameters:
        leoClient - Client object to configure.
        Returns:
        Reference to the configured Client.
        Throws:
        MalformedURLException - if the configuration file url that was set is invalid.
        InvocationTargetException - if the groovy config refers to objects not in the classpath.
        IllegalAccessException - if there is a rights issue accessing settings from the groovy config.

      • runClient

        public void runClient()
        Actual run method that configures and runs the client.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineException
        Main method for java execution.
        Parameters:
        args - list of String arguments for the program.
        Throws:
        org.kohsuke.args4j.CmdLineException - if there is an error parsing the command line arguments.

      • printUsage

        public static void printUsage()
        Print the command line usage statement to the console and exit.
